addr: 137 West 25th Street. 2nd Floor. New York City, NY 10001
title: ESTA Annual Holiday Celebration!
desc: Come celebrate with ESTA Board, Staff, Teaching Artists as we take a look back at the great year we had, and share with you what we have in store for the spring. Entertainment will be provided by ESTA's Pearls of Wisdom and additional elder artists from our programs. ? Be prepared to win prizes from our awesome raffle!? Delicious food and drinks will be served.? We are especially thrilled to receive support from Brooklyn Brewery, Cabot Cheese, Bruce Cost Ginger Ale, and Insomnia Cookies! If you have any questions, would like to volunteer, or donate food for the event please email us at:  info@estanyc.org We can't wait to see you!
